# Mindellect AI Solutions - AI Crawler Information

> Mindellect AI Solutions provides autonomous AI agents for insurance and business operations.
> Founded by Yehuda Mizrahi with 9 years of software development experience in the insurance industry.

## Services
- Autonomous AI Agents for Insurance
- Claims Processing & Underwriting Automation
- Legacy System Integration (Bafi, Sureness, Atid)
- Data Analysis Agents
